import { Meta, Story, Preview, Props } from '@storybook/addon-docs/blocks';
import { State, Store } from "@sambego/storybook-state";
import { action } from '@storybook/addon-actions';
import { text, withKnobs } from '@storybook/addon-knobs';

import Headline from './Headline';

export const headlineStore = new Store({
  subtitle: "A subtitle belonging to the Headline. Such item can contain lenghty text.",
  text: "Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.",
  title: "A title of the Headline",
});

export const onHeadlineUpdate = (payload) => { 
  action('onHeadlineUpdate')(payload);
  headlineStore.set(payload);
}

<Meta title="Components/Headline" />

# Headline

`@import { Headline } from '@storycopter/ui';`

## Props

<Props of={Headline} />

## Variations

      title="A title of the Headline"

<Preview>
  <Story name="editable">
    <State store={headlineStore}>
      {state => 
        <Headline
          backgImage={{"name":"image-h.png","base":"image-h.png","childImageSharp":{"resize":{"originalName":"image-h.png","src":"/static/750dc0c9885bfd9d4f95b95e9d134d4c/5c63f/image-h.png"},"fluid":{"base64":"data:image/png;base64,","aspectRatio":1.775,"src":"/image-h.png","srcSet":"/static/750dc0c9885bfd9d4f95b95e9d134d4c/4a076/image-h.png 355w,\n/static/750dc0c9885bfd9d4f95b95e9d134d4c/62657/image-h.png 710w,\n/image-h.png 1420w,\n/image-h.png 1920w","sizes":"(max-width: 1420px) 100vw, 1420px"},"fixed":{"base64":"data:image/png;base64,","width":1420,"height":800,"src":"/image-h.png","srcSet":"/image-h.png 1x"}},"publicURL":"/image-h.png"}}
          isEditable
          maskColor="rgba(255,255,255,0.5)"
          onElementUpdate={onHeadlineUpdate}
          subtitle={state.subtitle}
          text={state.text}
          textColor="#000000"
          title={state.title}
        />
      }
    </State>
  </Story>
</Preview>
